meanings.definition: Drink alcohol, especially in large quantities.
meanings.sent1: He was boozing at the party last night.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys boozing with her friends on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over a bottle while boozing around the house.
meanings.sent4: The river seemed to be boozing up all the rainwater.
meanings.sent5: Boozing under the stars felt like a rebellious adventure.

meanings.definition: The act of consuming alcohol, especially in excess.
meanings.sent1: His boozing has caused concern among his friends.
meanings.sent2: The party was filled with loud music and boozing.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show featured a skit about the dangers of boozing.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were alive with the sounds of boozing on New Year's Eve.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the glamorous side of boozing in the 1920s.
